title: Andrew Johnson National Historic Site: For Kids
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Things to Do     For Kids              For Kids         Junior Ranger booklet NPS PHoto   Kids can ask for a fun Junior Ranger booklet and earn a badge - all while becoming park stewards and learning about our 17th President.        Learn more about the Civil War bridge burners in East Tennessee! NPS Photo  Learn about "Civil War to Civil Rights" human interest stories during the 150th anniversary of the Civil War and Reconstruction. Find out how you can get a set of our Civil War trading cards at the Visitor Center.   On the back you can read a story about people, places, and events that were important to Andrew Johnson's story and the Nation as a whole.        Dress up by Andrew Johnson's old Tailor Shop NPS Photo   Dress up in clothes like those in Andrew Johnson's time, while he was working as a tailor, making clothes for the men of Greeneville.
